history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: S,codeNth,compose2_1IsPR. qsimpl time: 1 use: S,codeNth,filter10IsPR,compose2_1IsPR. qsimpl time: 1 use: S,codeNth,filter10IsPR,compose2_1IsPR. qsimpl time: 1 use: indIsPR,codeNth,S,filter10IsPR,compose2_1IsPR,pred. qsimpl time: 1 use: indIsPR,codeNth,S,filter10IsPR,filter01IsPR,compose2_1IsPR,pred.

exceptions.tactic: apply compose2_1IsPR with (g := fun a recs => codeNth (a - S (g a)) recs).
exceptions.exn: In environment listValues := fun (f : naryFunc 2) (n : nat) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => list nat) nil (fun (n0 : nat) (Hrecn : list nat) => evalStrongRec 0 f n0 :: Hrecn) n : naryFunc 2 -> nat -> list nat g : nat -> nat H : isPR 1 g The term "fun a recs : nat => codeNth (a - S (g a)) recs" has type "nat -> nat -> nat" while it is expected to have type "nat -> nat" (cannot unify "nat -> nat" and "nat").

In environment n : nat -> nat H0 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n (n 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n 0) g -> isPR (n (n 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) n0 : nat -> nat -> nat g : nat -> nat H : isPR 1 g Unable to unify "{p : PrimRec 2 | extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun a _ : nat => ?M1615 a)}" with "{p : PrimRec (n (n 0)) | extEqual (n (n 0)) (evalPrimRec (n (n 0)) p) (fun a recs : nat => n0 (a - n (g a)) recs)}".

In environment n1 : nat -> nat H3 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n1 (n1 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n1 0) g -> isPR (n1 (n1 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) H2 : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n1 0) g -> isPR (n1 (n1 0)) (fun a _ : nat => g a) n : nat -> nat H0 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n (n 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n 0) g -> isPR (n (n 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) n0 : nat -> nat -> nat g : nat -> nat H : isPR 1 g Unable to unify "{p : PrimRec 2 | extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun a _ : nat => ?M1941 a)}" with "{p : PrimRec (n (n 0)) | extEqual (n (n 0)) (evalPrimRec (n (n 0)) p) (fun a recs : nat => n0 (a - n (g a)) recs)}".

In environment n2 : nat -> nat H5 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n2 (n2 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n2 0) g -> isPR (n2 (n2 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) H4 : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n2 0) g -> isPR (n2 (n2 0)) (fun a _ : nat => g a) n1 : nat -> nat H3 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n1 (n1 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n1 0) g -> isPR (n1 (n1 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) H2 : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n1 0) g -> isPR (n1 (n1 0)) (fun a _ : nat => g a) n : nat -> nat H0 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n (n 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n 0) g -> isPR (n (n 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) n0 : nat -> nat -> nat g : nat -> nat H : isPR 1 g The term "fun _ _ : nat => Init.Nat.pred" has type "nat -> nat -> nat -> nat" while it is expected to have type "nat -> nat -> nat" (cannot unify "nat -> nat" and "nat").

In environment n3 : nat -> nat H8 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n3 (n3 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n3 0) g -> isPR (n3 (n3 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) H7 : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n3 0) g -> isPR (n3 (n3 0)) (fun a _ : nat => g a) H1 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat, isPR 1 (fun a : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) g (fun x y : nat => f x y) a) n2 : nat -> nat H5 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n2 (n2 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n2 0) g -> isPR (n2 (n2 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) H4 : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n2 0) g -> isPR (n2 (n2 0)) (fun a _ : nat => g a) n1 : nat -> nat H3 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n1 (n1 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n1 0) g -> isPR (n1 (n1 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) H2 : forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n1 0) g -> isPR (n1 (n1 0)) (fun a _ : nat => g a) n : nat -> nat H0 : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR (n (n 0)) f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR (n 0) g -> isPR (n (n 0)) (fun x y : nat => g (f x y)) n0 : nat -> nat -> nat g : nat -> nat H : isPR 1 g Unable to unify "{p : PrimRec 2 | extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun _ b : nat => ?M3073 b)}" with "{p : PrimRec (n (n 0)) | extEqual (n (n 0)) (evalPrimRec (n (n 0)) p) (fun a recs : nat => n0 (a - n (g a)) recs)}".

original: intros g H. apply compose2_1IsPR with (g := fun a recs => codeNth (a - S (g a)) recs). - apply filter10IsPR. auto. - apply filter10IsPR. apply indIsPR with (f := fun _ _ => Init.Nat.pred) (g := 0). apply filter01IsPR. auto.
